languages.english-overview:
X2CRM is an open source based Sales, Marketing Automation and Service application designed exclusively for companies that require a tightly focused customer information system. With special emphasis placed on marketing workflows, sales force speed and process optimization, X2CRM is remarkably compact and easy to use.
X2CRM is released under the GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3.
